cast.name: 罗恩·斯穆安伯格 Ron Smoorenburg

introduction: An ex-military man, Phat, who is having a difficult time appreciating the good in his life. Phat is a man who has resolve, but is taking his loved ones and current life for granted. After splitting with his Ex-Wife, Ploy, Phat finds himself in the wrong place at the wrong time being held captive by a group of mercenaries. After being kidnapped alongside a group of High Society Locals in exchange for a substantial payday Phat is presented with an opportunity at once more chance at proving to himself that he is indeed the honorable man his wife once loved. While attempting to escape and extract a wealthy young high-society man, Panit, Phat is propositioned to save Panit's fiance before he can leave. It is Phat's final chance at redemption, and once again being the person that his wife held so close once before.
